title: Gemini Embedding: Powering RAG and context engineering
summary: The Gemini Embedding model enhances AI applications, particularly through context engineering, which is being successfully adopted by various organizations across industries to power context-aware systems, leading to significant improvements in performance, accuracy, and efficiency.
content: The Gemini Embedding model enhances AI applications, particularly through context engineering, which is being successfully adopted by various organizations across industries to power context-aware systems, leading to significant improvements in performance, accuracy, and efficiency.
